${ModID}:MiracleWorker.NAME: Miracle Worker
${ModID}:MiracleWorker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a *Miracle on top of your draw pile.

${ModID}:Trash.NAME: Trash
${ModID}:Trash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Exhaust 1 card. NL Gain [E] .

${ModID}:MultiTool.NAME: Multi-Tool
${ModID}:MultiTool.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you end your turn with unused Energy, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
${ModID}:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL If X is 0, gain [E] and Exhaust.

${ModID}:ManifestMeal.NAME: Manifest Meal
${ModID}:ManifestMeal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Shuffle a *Food into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Food.NAME: Food
${ModID}:Food.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain X [E] . NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Investor.NAME: Investor
${ModID}:Investor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you spend 2 or more Energy on a card, gain !M! Block.
